Description: Fragment of a polychrome glazed composition tile.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:29/304 The North Suburb, the South Western Quarter, House T.36.30.
Curator's comments: Frankfort & Pendlebury, City of Akhenaten 2:54, pl.XXX, fig.1.
Exhibition history: 2012 7 December - 13 April 2013, Berlin, Neues Museum, In the Light of Amarna
